translation.en: [bubbling]
[Emily] Have you ever wondered what makes things glow?
translation.it: Vi siete mai chiesti cosa fa brillare le cose?

translation.en: Today, we're gonna focus on one of my favorites. Things that are...
translation.it: Oggi parliamo delle mie preferite. Le cose...

translation.en: fluorescent.
♪ Emily's Wonder Lab ♪
♪ Stay curious and keep exploring ♪
Hey, little scientists, come on in. -Hi, Miss Emily! -[Emily] Hello.
translation.it: - Ciao, piccoli scienziati. - Salve, sig.na Emily!

translation.en: Welcome!
-[cheerful music playing] -Now, art is pretty cool, right?
[kids] Yeah!
But we're not doing art today.
-We're doing science. -Yes!
Yes!
I wish there were a way that we could combine the two.
translation.it: Vorrei ci fosse un modo per combinarle.

translation.en: Ooh. Maybe there is.
Today, we are gonna make our own fluorescent paint.
translation.it: Oggi faremo la nostra vernice fluorescente.

translation.en: -Whoa. -That's gonna be fun.
Emily wants us to make fluorescent paint!
translation.it: Emily vuole che facciamo la vernice fluorescente!

translation.en: Could she be any cooler?
[Emily] But before we start making fluorescent paint,
translation.it: Ma prima di iniziare a fare la vernice fluorescente,

translation.en: we just have to turn off the visible light...
translation.it: dobbiamo spegnere la luce visibile e...

translation.en: -...and turn on... -[kids] Wow!
the invisible lights.
-Cool! -Whoa!
I love everything that glows, so today is my new favorite day.
translation.it: Amo le cose fosforescenti, oggi è il mio giorno preferito.

translation.en: Like, it's a dream, but in real life!
translation.it: Cioè, è un sogno, ma nella vita vera!

translation.en: This isn't just the ground. This is the floor-escent!
translation.it: Questo non è un semplice pavimento. È fluorescente!

translation.en: Follow the path on the ground to your stations
translation.it: Seguite il percorso fino alle vostre postazioni,

translation.en: and get all of your materials,
-then come back to the table. -[Arya] Let's do this!
I love stuff that glows!
Toys that glow, glow sticks.
Neon T-shirts, signs, lights.
It's like a glow party!
Emily, I wonder, what kind of lights are these?
translation.it: Emily, che tipo di luci sono queste?

translation.en: Ooh, good question, Zaela.
These lights that we are seeing right now are known as black lights,
translation.it: Queste luci sono chiamate luci nere

translation.en: and they're emitting a lot of ultraviolet light.
-[boy] Cool! -Wow.
Emily, why do sunglasses say "UV protection?"
translation.it: Perché gli occhiali da sole dicono protezione UV?

translation.en: So, "UV" stands for ultraviolet.
It's protecting you from the ultraviolet light
that comes from the sun.
It's really, really energetic, but that means that it can hurt our eyes,
translation.it: È molto energica, ma può fare male agli occhi

translation.en: and it can even hurt our skin.
-Sunscreen... -Oh, yeah. ...also has UV protection.
translation.it: Così, anche la crema solare ha la protezione UV.

translation.en: -That's cool. -I never knew that.
I thought I know everything about science.
translation.it: Pensavo di sapere tutto sulla scienza.

translation.en: No, Emily knows more!
translation.it: No, Emily ne sa di più!

translation.en: Hey, Emily, if UV light comes from the sun,
translation.it: Se la luce ultravioletta viene dal sole,

translation.en: then why don't we see it like this light? [Emily] That's a very good question, Zaela.
translation.it: - perché non la vediamo così? - Ottima domanda.

translation.en: You know the colors of the rainbow?
Red, orange, yellow, green, blue... [Zaela] Yeah.
translation.it: - Rosso, arancione, giallo, verde, blu... - Sì.

translation.en: [Emily] At the end, you have indigo and violet.
translation.it: Alla fine, ci sono indaco e violetto.

translation.en: [kids] Oh. [Emily] After violet comes ultraviolet.
Light that we can't really see with our eyes.
translation.it: una luce che noi non vediamo.

translation.en: So black light has ultraviolet light, but it also has a little bit of violet light.
translation.it: La luce nera ha luce ultravioletta e un po' di luce violetta.

translation.en: That's why we see it as kind of this purply glow.
translation.it: Ecco perché la vediamo come un bagliore violaceo.

translation.en: -[boy] What? -That's so cool. -Ultraviolet? -Yeah.
It sounds like the name of an alien planet. It does sound like the name of an alien planet.
translation.it: - Sembra il nome di un pianeta alieno. - Hai proprio ragione.

translation.en: So, fluorescents work with ultraviolet light.
translation.it: I colori fluorescenti compaiono con la luce ultravioletta. La luce invisibile.

translation.en: The invisible light.
translation.it: con la luce ultravioletta. La luce invisibile.

translation.en: It's really, really highly energetic light.
And when it hits the fluorescent paint,
the fluorescent paint absorbs some of that energy
and releases the rest of it with light that we can actually see with our eyes.
translation.it: e rilascia il resto con la luce che noi riusciamo a vedere.

translation.en: -That's cool. So cool. -Cool.
So to see that further, -I have a ping-pong ball. -Yeah.
translation.it: Per capire meglio, ho una pallina da ping pong.

translation.en: Okay, this ping-pong ball is like our ultraviolet light.
translation.it: Questa pallina è come la luce ultravioletta.

translation.en: And pretend that the table is like our fluorescent paint.
translation.it: Fingiamo che il tavolo sia come la vernice fluorescente.

translation.en: So, the ultraviolet light comes in really fast,
translation.it: La luce ultravioletta è molto veloce, va alla velocità della luce,

translation.en: at the speed of light, with highly energetic particles,
translation.it: La luce ultravioletta è molto veloce, va alla velocità della luce, con particelle altamente energetiche.

translation.en: and some of the energy is absorbed into the table,
translation.it: Parte dell'energia è assorbita dal tavolo

translation.en: and some of that energy is released
translation.it: e parte di essa è rilasciata

translation.en: back to us with light we can see.
translation.it: con la luce che noi vediamo.

translation.en: So when the ball bounces back up,
that's the light we see with our eyes.
translation.it: quella è la luce che vediamo noi.

translation.en: [Arya] Cool!
Yeah. And one ping-pong ball is cool, but it doesn't really illustrate the entire process,
translation.it: La pallina da ping-pong è forte, ma non spiega bene il processo,

translation.en: because that's happening with every single atom inside our fluorescent paint.
translation.it: perché questo accade con ogni atomo della vernice fluorescente.

translation.en: And there are trillions and trillions of atoms
translation.it: E ci sono trilioni e trilioni di atomi

translation.en: -inside the fluorescent paint. -Trillions?
-Trillions? -Whoa!
So instead of one ball, we need tons of them.
translation.it: Quindi, invece di una pallina, ce ne servono un sacco.

translation.en: Science is so fun!
Don't tell Emily, but I'm keeping this one.
translation.it: Non ditelo a Emily: ora è mia. Il rosa è il mio colore preferito.

translation.en: Pink is my favorite color.
translation.it: ora è mia. Il rosa è il mio colore preferito.

translation.en: [kids] Yeah!
When all those ping-pong balls were coming down,
translation.it: Le palline che venivano giù erano come i raggi energetici

translation.en: that was like the highly energetic rays of ultraviolet light,
translation.it: Le palline che venivano giù erano come i raggi energetici della luce ultravioletta e i loro rimbalzi

translation.en: and when they bounced back up,
translation.it: della luce ultravioletta e i loro rimbalzi

translation.en: that's like the spectacular parade of photons
translation.it: erano come la parata di fotoni

translation.en: that we see as different colors of light.
translation.it: che noi vediamo come colori di luce diversi.

translation.en: [kids] Whoa!
That is so cool.
Emily makes science fun.
Ping-pong balls and glow-y stuff?
translation.it: Palline da ping pong e cose fosforescenti?

translation.en: Wait a minute, is this a surprise birthday party for me?
translation.it: Cioè, è una festa a sorpresa per me?

translation.en: So, you guys ready to make some fluorescent paint yourself?
translation.it: Pronti a fare un po' di vernice fluorescente?

translation.en: -[kids] Yeah! -Okay.
Get your mixing bowls ready,
we're gonna create three different colors of fluorescent paint.
translation.it: creeremo tre colori diversi di vernice fluorescente.

translation.en: These are the insides of highlighters...
translation.it: Queste sono le parti interne degli evidenziatori.

translation.en: [kids] Wow!
...which contain chemicals that are fluorescent.
And so you want to take the color of your choice
and start pouring a little bit of water over the top
translation.it: e iniziate a versarci sopra dell'acqua

translation.en: while you squeeze it.
Look how that glows in the light.
Can I combine colors? -You can combine colors. -Whoa!
This is about experimenting.
translation.it: Stiamo sperimentando. Fai ciò che vuoi.

translation.en: -Do whatever you want. -Yeah!
translation.it: Stiamo sperimentando. Fai ciò che vuoi. Sì!

translation.en: [Emily] The other thing you want to do
is we're gonna do a little scoop of cornstarch,
translation.it: è mettere una cucchiaiata di amido di mais,

translation.en: just to thicken up our paint.
-All right? -Oh, my fingers are glowing!
translation.it: - Va bene? - Mi brillano le dita!

translation.en: -Your fingers are fluorescent. -Cool!
[Emily] Oh, my gosh. -Look at Nathan's face! -Whoa!
translation.it: - Oh, guardate la faccia di Nathan! - Wow!

translation.en: Your face is fluorescent.
-Really? -Yeah!
[Mason] We're glowing! We're glowing!
[Arya] I'm glowing! I'm glowing!
Ooh, this experiment makes me so happy. The messier, the better!
translation.it: Questo esperimento mi rende felicissima. Più è sporco, meglio è!

translation.en: I feel like a scientist.
Oh, no!
No! I put too much in.
Oh, don't worry about it. -Science is all about trial and error. -Oh, you're right.
translation.it: Tranquillo. Ricorda, si impara per tentativi ed errori.

translation.en: We're gonna add more cornstarch to thicken it up.
translation.it: Aggiungiamo più amido di mais per addensarla.

translation.en: Look how much this is glowing. [Mason] This is amazing.
translation.it: - Guarda come brilla. Che bella. - Stupendo.

translation.en: -Scientists, are you ready to go paint? -[kids] Yeah!
translation.it: - Scienziati, siete pronti a dipingere? - Sì!

translation.en: Okay, take your materials and let's go over to our canvas.
translation.it: Ok, prendete i materiali e andiamo alla nostra tela.

translation.en: -[kids] Whoo-hoo! -Yeah!
[boy] Okay, guys. Wow.
[Emily] Look at that.
[Zaela] It is gonna be a masterpiece.
I love painting. It's all over my hands and my hair.
translation.it: Adoro dipingere. Ce l'ho sulle mani e sui capelli.

translation.en: -I'm going to paint my nails green! -[laughing]
It's awesome!
Remember, art is all about exploring new boundaries.
And art and science is about expressing yourself.
translation.it: E l'arte e la scienza ci permettono di esprimerci.

translation.en: So, put down those paintbrushes,
and put your body into it.
♪ These kids are glowing in the dark ♪
translation.it: Questi bambini brillano al buio Al buio, sì

translation.en: ♪ They're glowing in the dark, yeah Glowing in the dark ♪
translation.it: Questi bambini brillano al buio Al buio, sì Brillano al buio Proprio al buio

translation.en: ♪ They're glowing in the dark ♪
translation.it: Brillano al buio Proprio al buio

translation.en: ♪ These kids are glowing in the dark They're glowing in the dark, yeah ♪
translation.it: Questi bambini brillano al buio Al buio, sì

translation.en: Science is messy, and I'm all about messes. [laughs]
translation.it: La scienza è sporca e io adoro sporcarmi.

translation.en: ♪ How do they do it? ♪ ♪ How do they glow? ♪
-♪ Did they eat some magic nachos? ♪ -One more.
Yeah!
♪ Glowing on their skin And on their clothes ♪
translation.it: Brilla la pelle Brillano i vestiti

translation.en: I look a mess!
♪ I bet Emily knows ♪
♪ Why those kids are glowing in the dark Glowing in the dark, yeah ♪
translation.it: Perché questi bambini brillano al buio Al buio, sì

translation.en: ♪ Glowing in the dark They're glowing in the dark ♪
translation.it: Brillano al buio Proprio al buio

translation.en: -[kids cheer] -[Emily] Okay, little scientists,
translation.it: Brillano al buio Proprio al buio Ok, piccoli scienziati,

translation.en: today we learned all about ultraviolet light,
translation.it: oggi abbiamo imparato tutto sulla luce ultravioletta,

translation.en: fluorescent paint, and all about how to combine art with science.
translation.it: sulla vernice fluorescente e su come unire arte e scienza.

translation.en: And remember, stay curious...
[all] And keep exploring!
♪ Emily's Wonder Lab ♪
♪ Stay curious and keep exploring ♪
For today's at-home experiment, we are going to make our very own lava lamp
translation.it: Per l'esperimento da fare in casa di oggi, faremo una lava lamp

translation.en: using the power of density.
Now, remember, all kid scientists need a grown-up's approval.
translation.it: Ora, ai piccoli scienziati serve il permesso di un adulto.

translation.en: So, for this one, you need a little bit of water, a glass, like this,
translation.it: Per questo, ci serve acqua, un bicchiere come questo,

translation.en: some vegetable oil,
salt,
translation.it: sale e, per restare in tema,

translation.en: and to go with the theme of the day, we have some phosphorescent powder
translation.it: sale e, per restare in tema, polvere fosforescente e una luce UV,

translation.en: and a UV light,
translation.it: polvere fosforescente e una luce UV,

translation.en: because we wanna make our lava lamp glow.
translation.it: perché vogliamo far brillare la nostra lava lamp.

translation.en: So, the first thing you wanna do
translation.it: Quindi, la prima cosa da fare

translation.en: is fill your glass most of the way
translation.it: è riempire quasi tutto il bicchiere

translation.en: with water.
And then, you wanna add your vegetable oil.
So, if we watch what happens here, watch closely,
because the vegetable oil is rising to the top.
translation.it: perché l'olio vegetale sale verso l'alto.

translation.en: That's because vegetable oil is less dense than water.
translation.it: Questo perché è meno denso dell'acqua.

translation.en: It's lighter than water, so it rises to the top.
translation.it: È più leggero dell'acqua, quindi sale in alto.

translation.en: Now, to start our lava lamp effect,
translation.it: Ora, per avviare l'effetto lava lamp,

translation.en: we have some salt here. Salt is heavier than water,
translation.it: qui abbiamo del sale, che è più pesante dell'acqua,

translation.en: so it's gonna wanna fall to the bottom.
So when I add it here,
you can see what happens.
It's grabbing onto the molecules in the oil, and taking down some of that oil with it.
translation.it: Si aggrappa alle molecole dell'olio e ne porta giù un po'.

translation.en: But once it gets down to the bottom,
translation.it: Ma una volta arrivato sul fondo,

translation.en: the salt dissolves in water,
and you can see the oil starts rising to the top again.
And we're seeing that same effect that we had before.
translation.it: È lo stesso effetto che avevamo prima.

translation.en: But we want to make it glow, right?
So let's add some phosphorescent powder.
And we're gonna make this glow really bright orange.
translation.it: E rendiamo questo bagliore arancione brillante.

translation.en: Mix, mix, mix, mix.
Okay, so, now, all we need is our UV light
translation.it: Ok, ora ci serve solo la nostra luce UV

translation.en: so we can see this glow in action.
translation.it: per vedere il bagliore in azione.

translation.en: Look at that, that worked so well!
And the fun part about this is that you can do this again and again.
translation.it: E la cosa divertente è che potete farlo ancora e ancora.

translation.en: And look at that, look how cool that is.
That is how you make your very own glowing lava lamp.
translation.it: È così che potete creare la vostra lava lamp.
